Articles.Content:
The embedded imgur images seem to not be working today, has anyone else noticed this?

Is there a fix?

Here's an example:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24533-Show-off-your-awesome-KSP-pictures%21?p=1823228&viewfull=1#post1823228](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24533-Show-off-your-awesome-KSP-pictures%21?p=1823228&viewfull=1#post1823228)

EDIT:

Looks like it's been fixed.

Mods, please close(or lock or whatever it is that you do to threads like this.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T18:26:55Z" title="04/06/2015 06:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
